pickListLeadText: - YOUR WEDDING STATIONERY DOESN’T NEED TO STOP AT THE INVITATIONS -
pickListText:
WE WORK WITH YOU TO CREATE A CONSISTENT & EXCITING SUITE OF BESPOKE STATIONERY WHICH TAKES YOU ALL THE WAY THROUGH YOUR DAY, FROM SAVE THE DATES TO THANKYOU CARDS.

The list of possibilies is endless but here are a few of the most popular requests...
personalServiceText: Your wedding day is one of the most important milestones in your relationship and we think it should reflect you both as a couple. For this reason, we believe it is really important to get to know our couples so we often like to set up a meeting with you to discuss your day and to get to know you a bit before we start any design work!  Get in touch via our contact form to finalise a proposal and set up a meeting.
introText1:
Having worked for award winning graphic and product design consultancies in the big smoke for 8 years our designer Freya decided it was time for a change and set about starting Br&newweddings and our parent company TheBr&newstudio LTD.

Whilst TheBr&newstudio concentrates on the more corporate world of graphics designing brands, logos, websites and corporate identities for some fantastic clients, our little sister Br&newweddings sets about making your wedding days beautiful and absolutely unique using all our skills, experience and inspiration.
introText2:
Hi there, I'm Freya founder and designer at Br&newweddings, lover of leopard print, fizz & dinner parties! 
The exciting news this year is that I myself am joining in the wedding planning fun as Steve and I plan our big day in November this year! Eeek!

In my own little studio I spend my days creating pretty things and I am passionate that your wedding day should reflect you both as a couple which is why each and every wedding we create at Br&new is completely unique or totally "brand new" (see what we did there!).

I am a total stationery geek and love exploring new and exciting processes, formats and details to make your stationery gorgeously jaw dropping. 

At Br&newweddings we aspire to create the most fantastic and quirky designs to any specification and help you to create an absolutely stunning result, building up the anticipation of your day through surprising one-of-a-kind invitations and wowing your guests on the day itself by developing a truly personal and unforgettable suite which takes them on a journey from arrival to bed time.

I look forward to hearing from you and finding out all about your wedding plans!
whatWeOfferText:
Style boards & inspirational assistance.  
2-3 concepts per item required.  
Unlimited design time.  
Endless enthusiasm.  
24/7 availablility (most of the time).  
Personal service - You work directly with the designer.  
Proofs & samples when required.  
Finishing, detailing, compiling - you get a finished product.  
Complete management from design to manufacture/print and delivery.  
Set up on day if required.
howWeWorkText:
After an initial meeting we compile and send over a complete proposal with associated costs and guideline printing and material costs depending on your requirements.

We create 2-3 concept routes, style boards and any other inspiration we feel is appropriate.

After developing up the chosen concept we supply proofs and samples if required and organise local printing or can supply print ready files if preferred.

We work closely with our couples to make sure every detail is right - even down to sticking stickers and tracking down matching stamps!

Everything is delivered on a next day signed for recorded delivery when complete, or delivered by hand depending on location and availability.
specialistText:
Br&newweddings have a vast network of craftsmen, printers and specialists who they can call upon for various speicalist requests including ceramics, woodwork, illustration, printing, letterpress, embossing and debossing, foiling and finishing.

These extra processes can add so much depth to a design and are discussed and costed per project accordingly.
